reg_pit.title: Reporting Information Affecting Public Health Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "executive medical director" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 150/2023, effective June 19, 2023.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: executive medical director means the executive medical director of the British Columbia Centre for Disease Control, being part of the Provincial Health Services Authority;

change.changenote: Section 15 (2) (part), (3) (part) and (4) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 150/2023, effective June 19, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The executive medical director may collect from the chief administrator of Immigration Canada personal information respecting a person who
The executive medical director may disclose to the chief administrator of Immigration Canada the types of personal information described in subsection (4) respecting a person
The executive medical director may disclose under subsection (3) only

change.changenote: Section 18 (2) (part), (3) and (5) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 150/2023, effective June 19, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The provincial health officer may designate the executive medical director as a person who may do one or more of the following on behalf of the provincial health officer:
The executive medical director must comply with any directions given, and any limits or conditions set, by the provincial health officer for the purposes of this section.
If authorized by the provincial health officer, the executive medical director may use and disclose a report and information to conduct or facilitate research into health issues.

change.changenote: Section 18 (4) (a) and (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 150/2023, effective June 19, 2023.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: make the report to the executive medical director, and
comply with a request for further information made by the executive medical director.

change.changenote: Schedule, section 1 (f.1) and (f.2) were added by BC Reg 276/2019, effective December 16, 2019.
Schedule, section 2 (o.1) was added by BC Reg 150/2023, effective June 19, 2023.
